text: Heyo - does anyone know how to stop the video_player from auto pausing? I want to use it for a background video

Hi everyone,

I'm a new to HubSpot and i'm making a group repeater module and i have button i want to show on a specific container but i can't seem to figure out how I it tried the display conditions but it doesn't seem to work for me.
What i'm specifically trying to do is I have a text field where I put in the amount of memebers like 1 or 2 - 5, I have a container where there is 6 - 10 and i want the button to show only on that container.
Could somebody help me out? Or give me some tips.

Hey are you trying to make the setting part not visible if its 6 or above?

Or are you talking about what is rendered?

<@U04UF7BNBK4>
Thank you for youre reply here a example of what i'm aiming to get.
the first picture only show the popular button where the text field is 6 - 10
but what i get is in the second picture
That makes sense i'm gonna try it out thank you for helping me :1000:
